cs4620.ray1.surface

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs4620.ray1.surface.Surface
      • cs4620.ray1.surface.Mesh

  • public class Mesh
extends Surface
    An interface between a MeshData and the ray tracer. When the Scene calls appendRenderableSurfaces on this object, it appends all Triangles on the mesh onto the given ArrayList. This way, the Scene has direct access to all intersectable Surfaces in the scene.
    Author:
    eschweic

      Constructors

      Default constructor; creates an empty mesh.

      Construct a Mesh from an existing MeshData.

      • intersect

        public boolean intersect(IntersectionRecord outRecord,
                Ray rayIn)
        Description copied from class: Surface
        Tests this surface for intersection with ray. If an intersection is found record is filled out with the information about the intersection and the method returns true. It returns false otherwise and the information in outRecord is not modified.
        Specified by:
        intersect in class Surface
        Parameters:
        outRecord - the output IntersectionRecord
        rayIn - the ray to intersect
        Returns:
        true if the surface intersects the ray
